column4: Kaspersky tones down threat of antitrust complaint against Microsoft
column5: HANOVER  Germany Russia's Kaspersky Lab has temporarily backed off filing a competition complaint that Microsoft is abusing its market dominance to crowd out anti-virus software makers such as  itself  founder and Chief Executive Eugene Kaspersky said.

column4: Kaspersky tones down threat of antitrust complaint against Microsoft
column5: HANOVER  Germany  April 25 Russia's Kaspersky Lab has temporarily backed off filing a competition complaint that Microsoft is abusing its market dominance to crowd out anti-virus software makers such as  itself  founder and Chief Executive Eugene Kaspersky said.
